title: Azure Active Directory: B2C Identity Protection & Conditional Access
description: ,You can enhance the security of Azure AD B2C implementation with Azure ADâ€™s Identity Protection and Conditional Access capabilities. Identity Protection allows organizations to automate the detection and remediation of identity-based risks, investigate risks, and export risk detection data to third-party utilities for further analysis. Conditional Access is the policy engine that brings signals together to make decisions and enforce organizational policies. Together, these capabilities give application owners significantly greater control over risky authentications and access policies.
